welcome_message_body: Welcome to Davao, where the charming blend of modernity and natural beauty awaits you. Known for its delicious durian fruit and the majestic Mount Apo, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time!

restaurants.name: Taste of Home
restaurants.description: Taste of Home is a bakery located in Davao City.
restaurants.address: Matina Town Square, MacArthur Hwy, 8000 Davao City, Davao del Sur
